動物用藥品名稱: 日生研豬放線桿菌胸膜肺炎、黴漿菌肺炎不活化混合菌苗
業者名稱: 卜蜂(台灣)股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防豬放線桿菌胸膜肺炎(血清型1、2、5)感染症及黴漿菌肺炎所引起的肺臟病變等病症。
ingredients: ACH DOSE(2ML) CONTAINS：ACTINOBACILLUS PLEUROPNEUMONIAE STRAIN 41-1(SEROTYPE 1)不活化前...1~5×10^9CFUACTINOBACILLUS PLEUROPNEUMONIAE STRAIN SHP-1(SEROTYPE 2)不活化前...1~5×10^9CFUACTINOBACILLUS PLEUROPNEUMONIAE STRAIN NG-2(SEROTYPE 5)不活化前...1~5×10^9CFUNON-TOXIGENIC CYTOTOXINS(源自重組E. COLI)-rApx I蛋白質...0.08~0.12MGNON-TOXIGENIC CYTOTOXINS(源自重組E. COLI)-rApx II蛋白質...0.08~0.12MGNON-TOXIGENIC CYTOTOXINS(源自重組E. COLI)-rApx III蛋白質...0.08~0.12MGMYCOPLASMA HYOPNEUMONIAE STRAIN MI-3...≧1×10^8 CFU FORMALIN...≦5μL、THIMEROSAL...≦0.2MG、ALUMINIUM HYDROXIDE GEL (AS ALUMINIUM)...≦6.6MG、PHOSPHATE-BUFFERED SALINE...適量至2ML
